chapter.text: 27|1|Ta, xin. Zhexie shi “gulanjing”——panbie zhen wei de jingdian——de jie wen,
27|2|shi xinshimen de xiangdao he jiayin.
27|3|Xindao zhe jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, duxin houshi.
27|4|Buxin houshi zhe, wo que yi wei tamen er zhuangshile tamen de xingwei, gu tamen shi paihuai qitu de.
27|5|Zhe deng ren shi ying shou yanxing de, tamen zai houshi shi zui kui she de.
27|6|Ni que yi feng dao cong zhi rui quanzhi de zhu jiang shi de “gulanjing”.
27|7|Dangri, mu sa ceng dui ta de jiashu shuo:“Wo que yi kanjian yi chu huoguang, wo jiang cong you huo di difang dai yige xiaoxi lai gei nimen, huo na yige huoba lai gei nimen kaohuo.”
27|8|Ta daole nage huo de fujin, jiu you shengyin hanjiao ta shuo:“Zai huo de fujin he sizhou de ren, dou meng fu you. Zansong an la——zhong shijie de zhu, chaojue wanwu.
27|9|Mu sa a! Wo que shi an la——wanneng de, zhi rui de zhu.
27|10|Ni pao xia ni de shouzhang ba!” Dang ta kanjian na tiao shouzhang wan yan ru she shi, jiu zhuanlian taobi, bu gan huigu.“Mu sa a! Buyao weiju, shizhemen zai wo zheli, que shi bu weiju de.
27|11|Ji xing bu yi, ranhou gaiguo cong shan zhe chuwai, wo (duiyu ta) que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.

27|12|Ni bashou charu ni de huai zhong, ranhou, chou chulai ta jiang bailiang liang de, que wu eji. Zhe shi pai ni qu zhaoshi falao he ta de baixing de jiu zhong jixiang zhi yi. Tamen que shi youzui de minzhong.”
27|13|Wo de xuduo mingxian de jixiang jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de moshu.”
27|14|Tamen neixin chengren naxie jixiang, dan tamen wei bu yi he aoman er fouren ta. Ni kan bainong shifei zhe de jieju shi zenyang de.
27|15|Wo que yi ba xuewen shangci da wude he su lai man, ta lia shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la! Ta ceng shi women chaoyue ta de xuduo xindao de puren.”
27|16|Su lai man jicheng da wude; ta shuo:“Zhongren a! Women ceng xuehui bai niao de yuyan, women ceng huode wanwu de xiangshou, zhe que shi mingxian de enhui.”
27|17|Su lai man de dajun——you jingling, renlei, niao lei zucheng——bei zhaoji dao ta de mianqian, tamen shi bushu zhengqi de.
27|18|Dengdao tamen lai daole yi gu de shihou, yige mu yi shuo:“Mayimen a! Kuai jin ziji de zhuchu qu, yimian bei su lai man he ta de dajun buzhi bu jue de jianta.”

27|19|Su lai man wei ta dehua er chayi di weixiaole, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni qishi wo, shi wo changchang ganxie ni suo ci wo he wo fumu de enhui, bing shi wo changchang zuo ni suo xiyue de shangong, qiu ni jie ni de enhui shi wo de ru ni de shanliang de puren zhi lie.”
27|20|Ta ceng jianyue zhong niao, ta shuo:“Wo zenme bujian dai sheng ne? Ta quexi ma?
27|21|Wo biding yanli de chengzhi ta, huo sha diao ta, chufei ta dai yige mingzheng lai gei wo.”
27|22|Ta douliu bujiu, jiu laile, ta shuo:“Wo zhidaole ni bu zhidao de shi, wo cong sai bai yi dai laile yige queshi de xiaoxi gei ni.
27|23|Wo que yi faxian yige fu ren, tongzhi yizu ren, ta huode wanwu de xiangshou, ta you yige pangda de baozuo.
27|24|Wo faxian ta he ta de chenmin dou she an la er chongbai taiyang, emo ceng yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen, yizhi zu'ai tamen zou shang zhengdao, suoyi tamen bu zunxun zhengdao.
27|25|Tamen bu wei an la er koutou——jieshi tiandi aomi, erqie shen zhi nimen suo yinhui he biaobai de zhu.
27|26|An la, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai zhe, ta shi weida de baozuo de zhu.”
27|27|Ta shuo:“Wo yao kan kan ni jiujing shi chengshi de, haishi shuohuang de.
27|28|Ni ba wo zhe feng xin dai qu tou gei tamen, ranhou, likai tamen, ni shikan tamen ruhe dafu.”
27|29|Ta shuo:“Chen pumen a! Wo jie dao yi feng guizhong de xin.
27|30|Zhe feng xin que shi su lai man ji lai de, zhe feng de neirong shi:‘Feng zhiren zhi ci de an la zhi ming.
27|31|Nimen buyao dui wo aoman wu li, nimen yingdang lai guishun wo.’”
27|32|Ta shuo:“Chen pumen a! Guanyu wo de shi, wang nimen chu ge yijian. Wo conglai bu jueding renhe yi jian shi, zhidao nimen zai wo mianqian.”
27|33|Tamen shuo:“Women ji you wuli, you you yongqi. Women dui ni wei ming shi cong, qing ni xiang yi xiang, ni yao women zuo shenme.”
27|34|Ta shuo:“Guowangmen mei gong ru yige chengshi, bi pohuai qizhong de jianshe, bi shi qizhong de guizu bian cheng jianmin, tamen zhexie ren, ye hui zheyang zuo de.
27|35|Wo biding yao pai ren song liwu qu gei tamen, ranhou, dengdaizhuo kan shi chen dai hui shenme xiaoxi lai.”

27|36|Dang shizhe daole su lai man de mianqian de shihou, ta shuo:“Nimen zenme yi caichan lai zizhu wo ne? An la suo ci wo de, shengguo ta suo ci nimen de. Buran, nimen wei nimen de liwu er yangyang deyi.
27|37|Ni zhuan huiqu ba, wo biding tongshuai tamen wufa dikang de jundui qu taofa tamen, wo biding ba tamen beijian de zhu chu jingwai, shi tamen chengwei shou lingru de.”
27|38|Ta shuo:“Chenminmen a! Zai tamen lai guishun wo zhiqian, nimen zhong you shei neng ba ta de baozuo na lai gei wo ne?”
27|39|Yige qiangliang de jingling shuo:“Zai ni li xi zhiqian, wo ba ta na lai gei ni. Wo duiyu zhe jian shi, que shi ji neng sheng ren, you zhongshi kekao de.”

27|40|Na shen zhi tian jing de ren shuo:“Zhuan shunjian, wo jiu ba ta na lai gei ni.” Dang ta kanjian nage baozuo anzhi zai ta mianqian de shihou, ta shuo:“Zhe shi wo de zhu de enhui zhi yi, ta yu yi ci shiyan wo, kan wo shi ganxie zhe, haishi gufu zhe. Ganxie zhe, zhi wei ziji de liyi er ganxie; gufu zhe,(xuzhi) wo de zhu que shi wu qiu de, que shi zun rong de.”
27|41|Ta shuo:“Nimen ba ta de baozuo gaizhuang yixia, yibian women kan ta neng fou renshi ziji de baozuo.”
27|42|Dang ta daolai de shihou, youren shuo:“Ni de baozuo xiang zheyang ma?” Ta shuo:“Zhe haoxiang shi wo de baozuo.” Zai ta zhiqian, women yi huode zhishi, women yi shi guishun de.
27|43|Ta she an la er chongbai de, fang'ai ta, ta ben shi shuyu bu xindao de minzhong.

27|44|Youren dui ta shuo:“Ni jin na zuo gongdian qu ba!” Dang ta kanjian na zuo gongdian de shihou, ta yiwei gongdian li yipian wangyang,(jiu tiqi yishang) luchu ta de liang xiaotui, ta shuo:“Zhe que shi yong boli zaocheng de guanghua de gongdian.” Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que shi zi qi de, wo (xianzai) genzhe su lai man guishun an la——zhong shijie de zhu.”
27|45|Wo que yi paiqian sai mo de ren de dixiong——sa li ha——qu jiaohua tamen (shuo):“Nimen yingdang chongbai an la.” Tamen like fencheng liang pai, huxiang zhenglun.
27|46|Ta shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Nimen weisheme zai enhui zhiqian yaoqiu xingfa zaori shixian ne? Nimen zenme bu xiang an la qiurao, yibian nimen meng zhu de lianmin ne?”
27|47|Tamen shuo:“Women wei ni he ni de xintu er zao e yun.” Ta shuo:“Nimen de e yun shi an la zhuding de. Buran, nimen shi yao shou kaoyan de.”
27|48|Dangri, cheng li you jiu huo ren, zai difang shang shangfengbaisu, er bu yifengyisu,

27|49|tamen shuo:“Nimen zhi an la huxiang mengshi ba!” Tamen shuo:“Women biding zai yejian mouhai ta he ta de xintu. Ranhou, women bi dui ta de zhu shuo:‘Ta de xintu yuhai de shihou, women meiyou zaichang, women que shi chengshi de ren.”
27|50|Tamen ceng yong yige jimou, wo ye ceng yong yige jimou, dan tamen buzhi bu jue.
27|51|Ni kan tamen de jimou de jieju shi zenyang de.(Jieguo) shi wo ba tamen he tamen de zongzu, quanti huimiele.
27|52|Naxie shi tamen de fangwu, yin tamen de bu yi er bian cheng wei tanta de. Duiyu you zhishi de minzhong ci zhong que you yige jixiang.
27|53|Wo ceng zhengjiule xindao erqie jingwei de renmen.
27|54|(Wo ceng) paiqian lu te, dangri, ta dui ta de zongzu shuo:“Nimen zenme mingmuzhangdan de gan choushi ne?
27|55|Nimen wubi yao she nuren er yi nanren manzu xingyu ma? Buran, nimen shi wu zhishi de minzhong.”
27|56|Tamen shuo:“Nimen ba lu te de xintu zhu chucheng wai, yinwei tamen shi chunjie de minzhong.” Zhe shi tamen weiyi de dafu.
27|57|Wo jiu zhengjiule ta he ta de xintu, ta de qizi chuwai, wo yi yuding ta he qiyu de ren tong shou xingfa.
27|58|Wo ceng jiang dayu qu shang tamen. Ceng shou jinggao zhe suo zao de yu zhen elie!
27|59|Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la. Zhu ta suo xuan de zhong pu ping'an.” Jiujing shi an la geng hao ne? Haishi tamen yong lai pei an la de geng hao ne?

27|60|Shi nei tiandi de chuangzao zhe (geng hao), ta wei nimen cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, yi peizhi meili de yuanpu, er nimen buneng shi yuanpu zhong de shumu shengzhang. Chu an la wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Buran, tamen shi beimiu de minzhong.

27|61|Haishi yi dadi wei anju zhi suo, shi zhu heliu guan qijian, shi zhu shan zhenya qi shang, bing zai liang hai zhi jian she yige pingzhang zhe ne? Chu an la wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Buran, tamen daban buzhidao.
27|62|Haishi na daying shounan zhe de qidao, er jiechu qi zaihai, qie yi nimen wei dadi de daili zhe ne? Chu an la wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Nimen hen shao juewu.

27|63|Haishi na zai lu hai de chongchong hei'an zhong yindao nimen, zai jiang qi enhui zhiqian, shi feng wei chuan jiayin zhe ne? Chu an la wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? An la chao hu tamen yong lai pei ta de.

27|64|Haishi na chuangzao wanwu, ranhou jiayi fu zao, bing cong tianshang dixia gong nimen jiyang zhe ne? Chu an la wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Ni shuo:“Nimen na lai nimen de zhengju ba, ruguo nimen shi chengshi de.”
27|65|Ni shuo:“Chu an la wai, zai tiandi jian de, bu zhi youxuan, tamen bu zhidao shenme shihou fuhuo.
27|66|Nandao tamen guanyu houshi de zhishi yijing chengshule ma? Buran, tamen duiyu houshi shi huaiyi de. Buran, tamen duiyu houshi shi mangmu di.”
27|67|Bu xindao de ren shuo:“Nandao women he women de zuxian zai bian cheng chentu hou hai yao bei fuhuo ma?
27|68|Women he women de zuxian, yiqian que yi tingguo zhe yi lei de konghe, zhege zhishi guren de shenhua.”
27|69|Ni shuo:“Ni yingdang zai dimian shang luxing, qu guancha fanzui zhe de jieju shi zenyang de.”
27|70|Ni buyao yin tamen de (beini) er youchou, buyao wei tamen de jimou er fanmen.
27|71|Tamen shuo:“Zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi chengshi de.”
27|72|Ni shuo:“Nimen yaoqiu zaori shixian de, huoxu you yibufen shi linjin nimen de.”
27|73|Ni de zhu duiyushiren, que shi you da en de, dan tamen daban shi bu ganxie de.
27|74|Ni de zhu, dique zhidao tamen de xiongzhong yinni de he tamen suo biaobai de.
27|75|Tianshang dixia, meiyou yi jian yin wei de shiwu, bu bei jilu zai yi ben mingbai de tian jing zhong.
27|76|Zhe bu “gulanjing”, dique ba yiselie de houyi suo zhenglun de da bufen de shili gaosu tamen.
27|77|Zhe bu “gulanjing” duiyu xindao zhe que shi xiangdao he enhui.
27|78|Ni de zhu, bi wei tamen yizhao ta de jueding er caipan. Ta que shi wanneng de, que shi quanzhi de.
27|79|Ni yingdang tuo kao an la, ni que shi ju you mingbai de zhenli de.
27|80|Ni biding buneng shi siren ting (ni jiang jiao). Ni biding buneng shi tuibi de longzi ting ni de zhaohuan.
27|81|Ni jue buneng yindao xiazi likai mi wu. Ni zhi neng shi xin wo de jixiang de ren ting ni de (jiang jiao), tamen yin'er chengyi xindao.
27|82|Dang yuyan dui tamen shixian de shihou, wo jiang shi yi zhong dongwu cong dixia shengchu, lai gaosu tamen: Renmen yuan dang que shi buxin wo de jixiang de.
27|83|Zai na ri, wo jiang cong mei ge minzu zhong, jihe yiqun buxin wo de jixiang de ren, er tamen shi bei pailie de zheng zhengqi qi de.
27|84|Dengdao tamen lai dao (an la) nali de shihou, ta shuo:“Nimen meiyou chedi zhidao wo de jixiang jiu jiayi fouren ma? Nimen jiujing zuole shenme ne?”
27|85|Yuyan jiang dui tamen de bu yi er dui tamen shixian, suoyi tamen ya kou wu yan.
27|86|Nandao tamen buzhidao ma? Wo yi heiye zuo tamen de anxi shijian, yi baizhou zuo tamen guankan de shijian, duiyu xindao de minzhong, qizhong que you xuduo jixiang.
27|87|Zai na ri, jiang chui haojiao, chu an la suo yiyu de wai, fan tianshang dixia de dou yao kongbu, ge ge dou yao beijian de lai dao an la nali,
27|88|ni jian qun shan er yiwei dou shi guding de, qishi, qun shan du xiang xing yun yang shiqu. Na shi jingzhi wanwu de an la dehuagong, ta que shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.
27|89|Xingshan de ren jiang huode geng jia de baochou, zai na ri, tamen jiang mian yu kongbu.
27|90|Zuo'e de ren, jiang pufuzhe bei touru huo yu:“Nimen zhi shou nimen de xingwei de baochou.”
27|91|(Ni shuo):“Wo zhi fengming chongbai zhe chengshi de zhu, ta ceng yi zhe chengshi wei jindi. Wanwu dou shi ta suoyou de. Wo yi fengming zuo yige guishun de ren,
27|92|bing xuandu “gulanjing”.” Shei zunxun zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wu ru qitu, ni dui shei shuo:“Wo zhishi yige jinggao zhe.”
27|93|Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, ta jiang xianshi gei nimen ta de jixiang, nimen jiu renshi ta. Ni de zhu, bing bu hushi nimen de xingwei.”
